ESG Report 2023
At Agios, we are committed to building a sustainable business that provides long-
term value for all our stakeholders. We support environmental, social and governance 
(ESG) initiatives that are aligned with our culture and values and that may positively impact the patients we serve, our employees, our communities and our world.
This document contains disclosure of sustainability metrics relevant to Agios’ 
business and strategy. These metrics are aligned with the Sustainability Accounting Standards Board (SASB) standards for the Biotechnology and Pharmaceuticals Industry and the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs). Unless otherwise noted, it covers ESG disclosures for Agios Pharmaceuticals for the period Jan. 1, 2022 through Dec. 31, 2022.
Agios Pharmaceuticals 
Corporate Sustainability  Tear Sheet
